question: Which racing driver has won the Tuscan Grand Prix Tournament?
explanation:
British Racing Driver Lewis Hamilton has recently clinched his 90th Formula One win after winning the Tuscan Grand Prix Tournament.
Valtteri Bottas reaced within 1.1 seconds of Hamilton and finished second while Red Bull driver Alexander Albon finished third and clinched his first career podium. Hamilton can equal Schumacherâ€™s record of victories at the Russian Grand Prix, as he is one win behind Schumacher.
